message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. How about $85?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit too high.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $85.  It's a fair price for both of us and will allow us to close this deal.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'll offer it to you for $97.50. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really benefit from this product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $97.50 is still more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm going to stick with my offer of $85. Let's make a deal and avoid any more back and forth.

Bob, I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $85. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer to try to meet you in the middle. I'll offer it to you for $92.50. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
